title: Nicki Minaj says she was being 'sarcastic' about Adele collaboration
text:
CLOSE

1982 • Musician: Nicki Minaj • Birthday: December 8, 1982 • Spotify followers: 16.2 million • Birthplace: Saint James, Trinidad And Tobago • Runner-up: Lil Wayne (Photo: Frazer Harrison / Getty Images)

False alarm, everyone. The Nicki Minaj and Adele collaboration fans got excited for isn't happening.

The "Chun-Li" rapper told Entertainment Tonight on Tuesday that she was working together with Adele on a project, after being asked if the duo was collaborating on anything in the near future.

"Adele made me swear to secrecy that I'm not allowed to tell anyone that I'm working with her," Minaj said. "And that we already shot a video. And it's an epic song! Ahh!"

However, after multiple outlets started reporting the news and fans began expressing their excitement, the 36-year-old took to social media to let everyone know she was just kidding.

"Omg guys," Minaj tweetedon Wednesday with laughing emojis. "I thought everyone could clearly see I was being sarcastic."

In an effort to do some damage control, the rapper joked she now has to go steal some files from Adele's studio in order to make this song happen.

"Who’s in the UK?" she wrote. "I got a job for you."

USA TODAY has reached out to Adele for comment.

The "Hello" singer's last album, "25," was released in 2015. The British songstress announced her breakup from her husband, Simon Konecki, earlier this year.

The faux collaboration announcement came just one month after Minaj revealed she was retiring from music.

"I’ve decided to retire & have my family," she wrote on Twitter. "I know you guys are happy now. To my fans, keep reppin me, do it til da death of me, (X) in the box- cuz ain’t nobody checkin me. Love you for LIFE."

Fans of the rapper were distressed over Minaj's joke.

"Sis I was really hype I’m tired of the lies," one fan tweeted.

Sis I was really hype 🙄 I’m tired of the lies 😭 pic.twitter.com/hctYN16l4i — tremain (@imtremainhaynes) October 16, 2019

Another fan joked that Minaj's fans, the Barbz, would be "deleting all the tweets about the Nicki X Adele collab after Nicki said that she was only being sarcastic."

the barbz deleting all the tweets about the Nicki X Adele collab after Nicki said that she was only being sarcastic 🤡 pic.twitter.com/l5AfQrH7Wi — 𝐅𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐨 (@onikamajesty) October 16, 2019

One fan said they "really believed in the Nicki and Adele collab."

I really believed in the Nicki and Adele collab 🤡 — Cody (@codycruz1139) October 16, 2019

Another devastated fan asked: "So nicki you was just playing about that Adele collaboration?"

So nicki you was just playing about that Adele collaboration? 🌚 @NICKIMINAJpic.twitter.com/kcSIDoBxSA — bratatata (@IttyUhh) October 16, 2019
